website_summaries.verdict: All-inclusive TSA kit with matching zippered case with great container assortment. Harder bottles that don’t crush easily.
pros: Convenient kit that includes a rare spray bottle and soap dispenser head
Easy to fill each container with help from included funnel
Spatula for cream jars has good-sized head to scoop out product
Zippered case has a better shape and design for easy opening
cons: Made of plastic and not silicone, and some reports of damage spray nozzle and leaky bottles

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I got this set of travel bottles because my husband and I like to travel light with smaller bags to avoid airline fees. The size of these are perfect because they can fit in pretty much anywhere. They all fit neatly into the clear bag that is much higher quality than I expected. The pack even comes with a set of labels to use to make sure nothing gets mixed up! As you can see in the picture, nothing about these feel cheap. The look pretty sleek to be honest. Overall, a very quality travel accessory and something I'd recommend to anyone traveling soon.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Czernicki

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: These plastic bottles were a waste of money. The pump bottle's nozzle was bent and didn't work. I should have returned the items. I was leaving on vacation the next day. I found better quality at The Dollar Tree. This is my first ever written review.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Plante

customer_reviews.title: Tested and Loved, bought again
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely leak proof. I took them on a 12 day trip and used my products daily, opening and closing the lids on each of the containers. 0 leaks! I was so happy with them I bought a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: well thought product! highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm packing for a trip and needed a solution to the quart size zip lock bags. Saw the product reviewed and decided to give it a try. It easily holds all my liquids, gels, etc. Nice, wide opening so packs easily. Since my trip is upcoming I haven't taken it through TSA yet but have no doubt it will sail through their check nicely. Customer service is good. The seller contacted me right away to see if the product was satisfactory. I'm thinking of ordering a second one for the things I pack in my checked luggage as the clear plastic makes it easy to see what is inside. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than a plain ziploc :)
customer_reviews.text: Love my new travel set! This travel set is functional and fun to use! Loved the included pipette and funnel. The labels were great too. It felt so nice to have something other than my usual ziploc baggie when going through security at the airport this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for different types of Clear bottles to put shampoo, conditioner, lotion, etc., in for travel, so I can see what’s what at a glance. Here they are, all in one TSA approved size, in one clear case. Perfect! I can’t answer the leak proof yet because I haven’t gone on the plane yet, which is when they leak if they’re going to. I always wrap extra blue or green painters tape around the seals anyway, just in case. It can be unstuck and re-stuck (are those words?) several times before the tape wears out. The item was shipped and arrived very quickly. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Not leak proof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a recent trip to Italy. No problems with TSA at all. It was great for about the first five days. Then one of the bottles I had my shampoo in started to leak around the top. About two days after that, the one carrying my bodywash opened on it's own accord and leaked all over the back, as well as through the fabric-like edging. Made a mess of my carry on. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Loompa

customer_reviews.title: Leakproof and TSA approved!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Went on a short trip and wanted to only bring a carryon so I purchased these for my necessary toiletries. Great quality and the clear bag makes everything organized and easily checked through TSA. You can fit some extras in the bag too such as travel sized toiletries, mascara and liquid foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A couple bottles were hard to fill and that’s when I remembered that they included spatula, two funnels and labels, but I didn’t think that even think getting a lotion into a hole that tiny on that one small squeeze tube would have worked. It would have to have been for an aftershave or something like that which I don’t use. The canisters are handy and I’m still using them to hold lip balm. Not a bad value. If it weren’t for that one bottle it would be 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna A. Safranek

customer_reviews.title: Bottles are cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this product is getting such good reviews. The bag is nice and good for TSA travel but the bottles are very cheaply made. We just used them for a trip and I'm pretty sure one or more trips and they will crack. One of them is already close to cracking in the middle in the spot you squeeze to get the soap out. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: The best travel purchase you will ever make.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best travel product I have ever purchased! I brought this for an out of country trip and have used for every trip sense! The containers are sturdy, and the labels awesome! The carrying case that comes with it is much roomier than you think, I have added other larger bottles and products like deodorant or a Razer with all the origional containers and it still fits! I would highly recommend this for frequent travelers or for a weekend get away!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great travel kit!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Small travel size products are expensive and you can't always find the brands/size you like. Globegear makes it easy to travel with the products you like! Shampoo, Conditioners, lotions.....traveling just got a lot easier! Nice quality bottles with stick on labels!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Truly life changing
customer_reviews.text: My travels just got way easier! I'm so happy I discovered this product, it's exactly what I was looking for! I was impressed when it arrived because beside being extremely useful, it's also pretty stylish and it comes in a very nice bag! The bottles are very high-quality and didn't experience any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Little bag of Wonder
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my international flight and let me tell you, I fit absolutely everything I needed and then some. I fit 3 bottles of Shampoo, hand sanitizer, Lysol travel spray, perfume, hairspray, hair conditioner spritz, 3 lipstick, lip balm, Neosporin, lotion, and wet wipes. I packed this wonderful bag full and had not issues. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Buy silicone instead.
customer_reviews.text: This product seems very cheap for the price. I bought another set for the same price from a different company that is silicone and they are way better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish they would squish.
customer_reviews.text: They serve their purpose. The carrying pouch fit nicely in my carry on and the labels were nice to distinguish the differences in product. My only complaint is that the bottles are a harder plastic. While I wouldn’t normally mind, when I squeeze them to get the product out, it feel as though I am going to break or crack them. I doubt they will last many trips, but for now they work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Good liquids kit for travel
customer_reviews.text: I took this kit, minus a few bottles, with me to Europe for two weeks. Most importantly, I passed through security in the US, the UK, and the EU with no hassles. The bottles also held enough liquids (shampoo and face wash/cleanser) for two weeks of staying in hotels. No problems at all; a great kit that I hope to use many more times.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Way to Pack Your Lotions and Cleansers for a Trip
customer_reviews.text: I needed something simple and inexpensive to pack my cleaners for a flight. This kit made things super easy. I really liked the small funnels that made pouring my lotions easier. The set comes with labels so you can clearly make what is what. However they did not stick -- that is why I gave this item a 4 out of 5. When I returned from trip I rinsed out the bottles so I can use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre S

customer_reviews.title: A little small but definitely leak proof!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a recent trip to St. John. Liked the bag and the bottles do seem to be leak proof. Carried them around in a hand bag for several weeks before my trip to test them out and had no issues then or during my 9 day trip. I would have given them a 5 star rating but for one small problem. The labels that came with (and thought they were a great idea!) did not stay adhered to the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: KateL

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: I like the bottles but the zipper came off after the first use. So now I have to pry the bag open. Cheap design. Also the labels come off.
customer_reviews.author: ReasonableRyan

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The bag is sturdy and holds much more than an average quart sized bag for plane travel. I've never had a problem getting through airport security. It really does hold a lot! The little containers are nice and have not leaked. I'd definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Roser

customer_reviews.title: First vacation.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these bottles in a nice clear zipper bag. And they were TSA 311 rule approved. I had no idea what the rule 311 rule was and was struggling to figure out how and what i was going to put my must have products in for my first vacation ever at 56. I love they came with little funnels to transfer my product. All so loved the spray bottle, and the bottles had the opening you push on one side of the lid and product comes out, instead of having to unscrew the lid off to use lotions, shampoo, etc. A BIG thumbs up to this handy TSA approved for my carry on. Marlene Diaz
customer_reviews.author: Marlene D.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel set. I put my face toner in the spray bottle, hair smoothing serum in small round container. Do wish these and other similar products can with small scoop to get last bit of conditioner or whatever out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn’t see measurements but this case is a little bigger than my hand.. i needed something larger so I could put additional items but this case holds ONLY what bottles it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Marie Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set it worked great for me! I love the bottles that come with this one. No leaks and the fact that it actually says TSA approved is helpful and reassuring (at least it was for me)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: T.S.A APPROVED!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how now I can take my hair gel and other lotions and liquids with no issues! I can take this on my carry-on luggage and not have to pay extra for luggage! I save myself a lot on every trip! THANKS GLOBAL GEAR! I NOW HAVE NO FEAR! Especially when I travel...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. 007🔱

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Two-Week Alaska Trip
customer_reviews.text: Convenient to carry and use, bottles and jars held enough for a two-week ship and land tour of Alaska. Nothing leaked, fit easily into my mini-backpack and could readily be found in my suitcase. See-through bottles let you monitor supplies. Quality construction was readily apparent. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Brant W. Free, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good range of bottles and leak proof but difficult to transfer products.
customer_reviews.text: This is a compact kit with a good range of bottles ranging from flip-tops to bottles with nozzles for spraying. The little funnel and dropper provided are pretty much useless though and therefore getting your products into the bottles can be messy. However, once it is in there it is leak proof. So far no trouble while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs wide mouth squeeze tubes
customer_reviews.text: It seems nice but after getting it and thinking about my needs I bought a set of silicone squeeze tubes with a large mouth under the cap for Most of my needs - shampoo, body soap, lotion, hair gel.
customer_reviews.author: tesla

customer_reviews.title: Labels and containers are great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I travel alot and so far the labels and containers are holding up very well, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Organized!
customer_reviews.text: This set was perfect for travel.Organized.And had labels that you can apply! I did buy another set from Walmart for shampoo,conditioner,etc.but this was perfect for makeup stuff.I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: OzarksRN

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: We have not flown for some years, and needed to find a convenient way to pack in a legal way. We are in our 70’s and found the design and quality were just what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Gwinn

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered very damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product came to me damaged so I can’t even use it
customer_reviews.author: Heather Amanda 🌸

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Because I travel more for my job now I needed a travel toiletry bag that I can take and go through security quickly at the airport. This is just that. No leaks either... I haven't had one issue and the inside of the bag doesn't get all slimey either. If you are a traveller, you need this!
customer_reviews.author: Thom Burt

customer_reviews.title: Don't worry about security anymore
customer_reviews.text: I liked that everything is neatly packaged and it gives you blank labels along with regular labels in case you want to label something that's not on the list of labels they gave you. I can use this product for my ftures travels and it's nice because not I can take some of my beauty products without worrying about getting through security with them. I really like this product! It's great for traveling by yourself and with others!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the bottles and the bag is better than I expected! Everything I need fits perfectly and I really liked the funnel that came with the set for easy pouring. The spray bottles work well too. Looking forward to taking this on my upcoming trip.
customer_reviews.author: Elysia Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Very complete
customer_reviews.text: It is incredible how you can put so many things in a little pouch. I like that it has different kind of bottles for different liquids you may need, that is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: gemma

customer_reviews.title: Great travel kit and perfect for air travel.
customer_reviews.text: I Really like this travel kit. Everything is enclosed in an easy to transport see through case. Bottles all seem really nice and the labels are awesome. I really like this and it is perfect for my upcoming trip abroad.
customer_reviews.author: Artw0rk

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd Order - This Time As A Gift
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for my extensive travel use. I have used my own for several months and ordered these as a gift. No leaks. Easy to pack. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Santa

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 time use Travel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before a 2 week trip. By the end of the trip the bottles were bent for being squeezed. I threw them away once I got home. But worked great while on the trip and never leaked!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Corri

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described along with some extras
customer_reviews.text: Nice travel kit including mini funnels to pour your "goo" and lotions into the bottles. Stickers for the bottles are also included.
customer_reviews.author: momarketer

customer_reviews.title: One bottle leaked
customer_reviews.text: Works great for flying and I love the little bottle with the pump. One of the shorter bottles came open on our flight home and dumped conditioner on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Snapp

customer_reviews.title: Great little deal
customer_reviews.text: Took all bottles on the airplane and bad not trouble. Nothing leaked or spilled out. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, perfect, perfect for your travel needs. The labels included, the mini funnel, and the quality of the bottles are a win. I actually have two sets of these. You won't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunti

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a 5-day, 4-night trip. The bottles were the perfect size with room to spare. They did not have a cheap plastic feel at all--which I was a little nervous about when reading the reviews about similar products. I love the lotion /soap dispenser with the lock. The ONLY problem is I left it in the shower of the hotel!! :( If I can re-order just that one piece, I most certainly will.
customer_reviews.author: S Harris

customer_reviews.title: TSA approved it on trip
customer_reviews.text: Went through TSA without any problems and I was able to fit extra items in bag.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa S. Mora

customer_reviews.title: Travel bottles
customer_reviews.text: They are as described. I did not have a problem with them leaking or popping their top after a long flight. That made me happy not to have a mess to clean. I didn’t over fill them too!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Works alright, a little cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The two small circular containers are pretty fragile. Mine have cracker after only a few trips. They’ll work for now, but I’ll have to replace them eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, as much space as allowable by TSA, and a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderNYC

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing to compare this too.
customer_reviews.text: The product is well thought out. The seller seemed very nice. However, I do not have anything to compare this to, so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Thackaberry

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality. Bag is thin and zipper is not sturdy. Bottles are descent.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous!! I loved it and it’s great for TSA clearance. I had no problems with my toiletries
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use the bag - only the bottles and only in my checked bag. No leaking at all.
customer_reviews.author: rik j carter

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, very good quality. highly recommended. I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Josmary Marte

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect. Didn't have any problems going through TSA and it was nice not having to pack the full bottles of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: JoHanna

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Did a leak test on the bottles first thing and they passed the test. I especially like that the bag sits upright and isn't prone to tipping over when set down. Holds plenty without feeling awkward or bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Bernier

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and clear case makes it easy to see what is inside. TSA seems to like this...didn't have any issues with airport security. Product did what it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: William Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good travel set
customer_reviews.text: I liked this travel bag. I had no leaks at all during my entire trip and each bottle holds quite a bit of product. I wish it were just a little bigger so I could fit a few of my other bottles, but it was a good bag for the price. I will be reusing for my next trips to come!
customer_reviews.author: Noopur D.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t leak.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfect for my trip had no issues no leaks. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: doxies

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, bottles could have been better though
customer_reviews.text: Helpful. Bottles broke halfway through my trip without using them particularly roughly.
customer_reviews.author: Lilka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little travel bottles
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and well organized set of little travel bottles. I loved how they included extra labels for the bottles. They also sent me a thank card from purchasing from them. Great customer service! I will buy from them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Isis Mijares

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my travels
customer_reviews.text: I will be traveling in June and this is just right for my shampoo, conditioner etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: No leak!
customer_reviews.text: I took them with me on our honeymoon trip of two weeks, it was perfect! No leaking whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: ellie kim

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: Overall great bundle! The bag is nice for travel, it’s sturdy and works like a charm. The assortment of bottles inside is what I need. The options are a fit for anyone for any trip and the labels are handy when in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon s.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2-3 day Getaway
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of products for my hair and face. I usually always check my bag in because of this. But I found this and it was a perfect little travel companion. Bottle sizes were perfect for a 2-3 day weekend. Lots of bottle type choices. It also provides many label choices for the bottles. I can do carry on more often now. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Easy Fill up!
customer_reviews.text: I figured Getting something like this would be a headache to fill up, with hair creams like leave in conditioner and curl cream. BUT this kit came with 3 tools to help and they definitely made filling them up much easier less messy and quicker!
customer_reviews.author: tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right away. Used it in carry on. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Minature
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where all the stellar reviews are coming from. I just received this kit today, and although is it's a nice configuration, the sizes are just too small. The bottles and containers would hold enough product for a day or two at most. Now I need to find another option.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, good quality, did it's job through the screening for carry on, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer tessen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Useful. Comes with a funnel which helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: denver huff

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good product, already used on two trips with good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Moorhead

customer_reviews.title: No problem with TSA security, no leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Brought these through TSA with me at a few different airports. No problems, no leaks, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I travel a fair amount and am always wanting to condense product. Good variety of bottles and some jars, as well as funnel, etc to help fill. Bottles are supple but sturdy unlike other products that are so rigis they break easily. Ordered one and then ordered another!
customer_reviews.author: ABJB

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my wife to use on our vacation and she liked them. No leaking. Win.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Frazee

customer_reviews.title: LEAKY
customer_reviews.text: This kit was a waste of money. A couple of the containers worked but the others leaked horribly and spilled almost all of the product in them.
customer_reviews.author: MyAmazonReviews

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are kind of cheap and the funnel is useless. The bottles also dont squeeze and they are kind of small. I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Daggett

customer_reviews.title: Very useful travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I am always going on business trips. I always take this bag with all my favorite supplies. No Leakage! This kit is so useful for someone on the go
customer_reviews.author: Micky N

customer_reviews.title: Great travel kit!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my ongoing air travel. It came with useful labels and plenty of bottles in perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poorly made. The zipper tore from the pouch almost immediately as I was getting ready to leave from my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lamey

customer_reviews.title: Best travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel kit. The quality of the bag is top notch, the kit has all the essential bottles and tools for liquids. Excited to take it with me on vacation soon
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage space
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact travel kit. Doesn’t take up much space but holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Harry James Johnson Jr

customer_reviews.title: This travel set is really good! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because I travel a lot and I'm tired of carrying the hole bottle of shampo.... I'm currently on a trip, so I have to write that this is a great set, it is really complete and most important the bottles doesn't lick!!! Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Cano

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sturdy travel pouch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my husband and liked it so much, now I must order one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: As promised product
customer_reviews.text: Product as promised... the gadgets for filling are cute but not very useful and I think are just a waste
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this! Does exactly what it's advertised to do, and has a lot of helpful tools for filling the containers. The labels are awesome. I'm glad I got this--I had no issues with TSA!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Passed through TSA but leaks
customer_reviews.text: One of the containers leaked over everything in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat TSA travel bag
customer_reviews.text: This TSA travel bag is pretty neat and useful. Used it for travel overseas a couple of weeks ago and liked using the different transparent containers
customer_reviews.author: serge taran

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this travel set. Useful, good sized, and seems like it'll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jxn

customer_reviews.title: She like using them.
customer_reviews.text: I use the traveling bottles for my daughter gym class at school she has swimming lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Schell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I used the small bottles to keep hand sanitizer in my car. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was great for our recent flight! Perfect size, lots of options, and did not leak!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great Products!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t got to use them yet but I have a flight coming up in just a few weeks. Product is sturdy and exactly as advertised. Shipping was super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Likey
customer_reviews.text: Used on a trip to Aruba. Didn’t have any problems. Highly recommend when traveling through customs.
customer_reviews.author: paradis

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Things came broken. I was super excited for this but things came broken rendering them useless.
customer_reviews.author: finn lepage

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a trial for a future trip involving a carry on bag for a 5 day vacation. For the price vs department stores this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: So I really didn’t want to check any bags for my trip I was able to travel with this very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for flying! Just pull the bag out and put it in the bucket.
customer_reviews.text: There functionality and smaller bottles were perfect for a long weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Stickney

customer_reviews.title: Jars need improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The jar caps are not threaded correctly to match the bottom part. After a three weeks travel, they became hard to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: wss125

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the selection of container options. Just a note if you are looking to maximize your 3 fluid ounces, these are smaller than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient! Loved all the tools to help putting products in. Would like 2 of the spray bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

product_meta.title: Travel Bottles & TSA Approved Clear Quart Size Bag for Toiletries and Liquids with Leak-Proof Containers & Accessories
feature_bullets: TSA APPROVED - GLOBEGEAR travel bottles and toiletry bag are fully compliant with 3-1-1 rule for carry-on liquids on domestic and international flights.

LEAK-PROOF & ESSENTIAL BOTTLES VARIETY - GLOBEGEAR bottles and containers are leak-proof. This kit for toiletries comes with four 1.7oz/50ml empty spray, pump and squeeze plastic bottles, 30ml tube and two 10g jars.

CONVENIENT TRAVEL ACCESSORIES - Travel kit includes convenient mini spatula, pipette and small funnel to easily transfer liquids, cream, gel, oil and other toiletry. Pre-printed and empty sets of labels will help you easily distinguish contents of each container.

VERSATILE & STYLISH - GLOBEGEAR travel kit is ideal for carry-on luggage, travel, cruise, business trips, gym, camping, picnic, beach, everyday on the go, also it’s a perfect gift for any occasion. Stylish and compact design suits well everyone.

SATISFACTION PLEDGE - We are a family owned business and trademark based in Los Angeles, California. We are committed to provide our customers with high quality products and best service. We are always happy to resolve any issues with your order and happy to hear your feedback, please contact us directly for assistance.
